name: Sample Case 5: Medical Collection with Timeline Issues
description: A de-identified medical collection showing potential re-aging patterns.
raw_text:
MEDICAL COLLECTION

Collection Agency: HEALTHCARE REVENUE SERVICES
Original Provider: REGIONAL MEDICAL GROUP
Account Type: Medical Collection

Account Opened: 05/10/2022
First Delinquent: 08/15/2018
Last Activity: 08/15/2018
Date Reported: 09/2024

Original Amount: $456
Current Balance: $456

Will be removed: 05/2029

Bureau: Experian
notes: This medical collection shows: (1) Date opened (2022) is almost 4 years after DOFD (2018), indicating the collection agency is using their own open date; (2) Removal date (2029) is 7 years from their open date, not from DOFD - it should be around 2025-2026 based on DOFD. This debt may have already exceeded the proper reporting period.
